da.welcome_subtitle: Udforsk scores fra de største specialister i spillet.
da.no_scores_player: Ingen scores fundet for denne spiller endnu.
da.process_subtitle: Sådan sikrer vi validitet og unikke rankings i vores specialist-bank.
da.step_ranking_desc: Scores sorteres efter PP pr. kategori.
da.duplicate_logic_desc: For at undgå at den samme score tæller flere steder, bruger vi en unik identifikations-nøgle for hvert play:
da.duplicate_logic_note: Dette sikrer, at hvis en spiller har sat en score med forskellige mod-kombinationer, gemmer vi kun den mest relevante for hver specifik kategori.
da.why_specialist_desc: Standard leaderboards fokuserer ofte kun på den samlede PP. Vores system prioriterer:
da.mod_dominance_desc: Hvem er bedst til EZ, FL eller 3-mod?
da.map_diversity_desc: Vi tracker unikke plays på tværs af specialist-maps.
da.hist_data_desc: Vi kombinerer data fra flere kilder for et komplet overblik.
da.legal_info_desc: Dette websted er et fan-projekt skabt til statistisk analyse og underholdning. Vi er ikke tilknyttet ppy Pty Ltd eller det officielle osu! team.
da.legal_accuracy: Alle data leveres 'som de er' uden garanti for øjeblikkelig nøjagtighed, da JSON-kilder opdateres i intervaller.
da.copyright_desc: Spildata, beatmap-billeder og spiller-avatarer tilhører deres respektive ejere. Projektets kildekode er stillet til rådighed under MIT Licensen.
da.auto_update_msg: Data opdateres automatisk ved hver indlæsning af specialist-JSON filer.

en.welcome_subtitle: Explore scores from the greatest specialists in the game.
en.no_scores_player: No scores found for this player yet.
en.process_subtitle: How we ensure validity and unique rankings in our specialist bank.
en.step_collection_desc: JSON data is fetched from specialist modules.
en.step_scrubbing_desc: Duplicates are removed via Beatmap-ID & PP.
en.step_ranking_desc: Scores are sorted by PP per category.
en.duplicate_logic_desc: To avoid the same score counting multiple times, we use a unique identification key for each play:
en.duplicate_logic_note: This ensures that if a player sets a score with different mod combinations, we only save the most relevant one for each specific category.
en.why_specialist_desc: Standard leaderboards often focus only on total PP. Our system prioritizes:
en.mod_dominance_desc: Who is best at EZ, FL, or 3-mod?
en.map_diversity_desc: We track unique plays across specialist maps.
en.hist_data_desc: We combine data from multiple sources for a complete overview.
en.legal_info_desc: This website is a fan project created for statistical analysis and entertainment. We are not affiliated with ppy Pty Ltd or the official osu! team.
en.legal_accuracy: All data is provided 'as is' without guarantee of immediate accuracy, as JSON sources are updated at intervals.
en.copyright_desc: Game data, beatmap images, and player avatars belong to their respective owners. The project's source code is provided under the MIT License.
en.auto_update_msg: Data is automatically updated with each load of specialist JSON files.
